system.description: The character has an innate ability to land on their feet, reducing the danger of falls and improving their acrobatic abilities.
system.benefit: Reduce Distance of all falls by Agility Bonus Metres, ignoring it as if it didn't exist. Also add +20 to Acrobatics Skill Tests when using the Jump Special Use for the purpose of reducing Fall Damage.

skills.condition: When using the Jump Special Use to reduce Fall Damage

specialAbilities.name: Reduce Fall Distance
specialAbilities.description: Reduce Distance of all falls by Agility Bonus Metres, ignoring it as if it didn't exist.
